Ukrainian president Zelenskiy's press conferenceUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy addressed a press conference in Kyiv on Sunday, a day after the second anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 17:42:52 GMT VMWL7J5CTJLLVNO3SXBZOM23OQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-president-zelenskiys-press-conference-2024-02-25/Reuters世界欧洲
US condemns 'sham' elections in Belarus -State DeptThe United States condemned what it called "sham" parliamentary and local elections held in Belarus on Sunday, the State Department said. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 17:19:58 GMT DDVVUHTR2RKEROBBF3GBQ2SNSE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-condemns-sham-elections-belarus-state-dept-2024-02-25/Reuters世界
Taliban releases Austrian far-right activist held in AfghanistanThe Taliban on Sunday released Herbert Fritz, an 84-year-old Austrian and far-right nationalist who was arrested in Afghanistan last May. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 17:18:42 GMT 5LB2GRZLBBJITC7PCPTRPQIYQM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taliban-releases-austrian-far-right-activist-held-afghanistan-2024-02-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
Mauritius stops Norwegian Cruise Line ship from docking, cites health riskMauritius stopped a ship belonging to Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings from docking at its ports due to what it said was a health risk and took samples from about 15 passengers who were in isolation on board, its port authority said on Sunday. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 17:07:28 GMT KYEKNFBJQNOQ7JH5YJFWOBLSSA https://www.reuters.com/world/mauritius-stops-norwegian-cruise-ship-docking-cites-health-risk-2024-02-25/Villen Anganan世界
Paris conference to belie 'doom and gloom' on Ukraine, Elysee saysSome 20 European leaders will gather in Paris on Monday to send Russian President Vladimir Putin a message of European resolve on Ukraine and counter the Kremlin's narrative that Russia is bound to win a war now entering its third year, France said. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 17:04:55 GMT 54ENOO2FVROXNL3WZ7PMMRBQ2Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/paris-conference-belie-doom-gloom-ukraine-elysee-says-2024-02-25/Michel Rose世界欧洲
Russia will try new offensive in Ukraine this summer, Zelenskiy saysRussian forces are preparing for a new offensive against Ukrainian defenders in late May or summer, but Kyiv has a clear battlefield plan of its own, President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Sunday. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 16:57:38 GMT FRDGN4CG5ZPYRFQZVWWZSZMWGU https://www.reuters.com/world/ukraine-has-plan-new-offective-against-Russia-says-zelenskiy-2024-02-25/Olena Harmash, Dan Peleschuk世界
Brazil's Bolsonaro gathers supporters in show of strength amid coup probeSupporters of Jair Bolsonaro gathered on Sunday on Sao Paulo's iconic Paulista Avenue to show support for the former far-right Brazilian president as he finds himself embroiled in several investigations that many believe could land him in jail. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 16:55:05 GMT 3YCGPIYWEFJS5CRBQ2LBGGEHSQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazils-bolsonaro-gathers-supporters-show-strength-amid-coup-probe-2024-02-25/Ricardo Brito世界美洲
Zelenskiy says 31,000 Ukrainian soldiers killed since Russia invadedPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Sunday that 31,000 Ukrainian soldiers had been killed since Russia's full-scale invasion two years ago, giving the first official figure for more than a year. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 15:49:51 GMT XE5NEXBMMBUNPLUGINWDPI6E https://www.reuters.com/world/zelenskiy-says-31000-ukrainian-soldiers-killed-during- Russias-invasion-2024-02-25/Reuters世界
Netanyahu says it is unclear if hostage deal will emergeIsraeli Prime Minister Netanyahu on Sunday said it was not clear yet whether a hostage deal would materialize from ongoing talks, declining to discuss specifics but saying the Islamist militant group Hamas needed to "come down to a reasonable situation." Sun, 25 Feb 2024 14:36:14 GMT ZKQFH3JCIVOYXJPBKSDSPZ33II https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-it-is-unclear-if-hostage-deal-will-emerge-2024-02-25/Reuters世界中东
US, Israel, Egypt and Qatar have agreed on 'basic contours' of hostage deal, Sullivan saysThe United States, Egypt, Qatar and Israel have come to an understanding of "basic contours" of a hostage deal for a temporary ceasefire in Gaza, U.S. National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan said on CNN on Sunday. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 14:35:58 GMT KTSK7QG52ZKV7EZTVJUMBAXAWM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-israel-egypt-qatar-have-agreed-basic-contours-hostage-deal-sullivan-2024-02-25/Reuters世界中东
Ukraine floats possibility of inviting Russia to peace summitUkraine and its foreign partners could invite Russia to a future peace summit to discuss an end to Moscow's two-year-old invasion on Kyiv's terms, a senior Ukrainian official said on Sunday. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 13:23:09 GMT BOSQZTRQJVJERI2DU4CL65FDFA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-floats-possibility-inviting-Russia-peace-summit-2024-02-25/Reuters世界欧洲
